DOC.brief_summary: Background : There hypothesis literature mechanical action deep transverse friction massage ( DTF ) produce vasodilatation increase blood flow . But yet , experimental study confirm effect DTF blood flow Achilles tendon . Objective : The purpose present study investigate whether one session DTF influence Achilles tendon blood flow . Design : randomize pre- posttest trial set . Patients : Sixty-two healthy participant volunteer . Each person underwent follow four step procedure : 1 . Measuring tendon blood flow ( PRE ) , 2.fifteen minute DTF Achilles tendon , 3 . Measuring tendon blood flow ( POST ) , 4.follow - measurement 20 minute rest ( POST20 ) . Intervention : one leg person randomly assign deep transverse friction session , leg use control leg . Friction apply continuously total 15 minute . Measurements : microcirculation determine 2 8 tissue depth distal proximal midportion Achilles tendon . For level , capillary blood flow , tissue oxygen saturation , postcapillary venous filling pressure register .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Deep Friction Massage Achilles Tendon Blood Flow
